query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `platform_settings` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `key` varchar(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `value` text,
  `description` text,
  `updatedBy` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `admin_activity_log` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `action` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `entityType` varchar(100),
  `entityId` int,
  `entityTitle` varchar(255),
  `details` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cms_pages` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `slug` varchar(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `description` text,
  `pageType` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'landing',
  `status` varchar(20) DEFAULT 'draft',
  `metaTitle` varchar(255),
  `metaDescription` text,
  `ogImage` varchar(500),
  `showHeader` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `showFooter` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `customCss` text,
  `createdBy` int,
  `publishedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cms_page_sections` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `pageId` int NOT NULL,
  `sectionType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255),
  `subtitle` varchar(255),
  `content` json,
  `backgroundColor` varchar(50),
  `textColor` varchar(50),
  `paddingTop` int DEFAULT 40,
  `paddingBottom` int DEFAULT 40,
  `sortOrder` int DEFAULT 0,
  `isVisible` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `navigation_menus` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `location` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'header',
  `isActive` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `navigation_menu_items` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `menuId` int NOT NULL,
  `label` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `url` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `target` varchar(10) DEFAULT '_self',
  `icon` varchar(50),
  `parentId` int,
  `sortOrder` int DEFAULT 0,
  `isVisible` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `practice_logs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `practiceType` varchar(50),
  `targetLevel` varchar(20),
  `score` int,
  `durationSeconds` int,
  `questionsAttempted` int DEFAULT 0,
  `questionsCorrect` int DEFAULT 0,
  `details` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_sessions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `sessionType` varchar(50),
  `targetLevel` varchar(20),
  `score` int,
  `durationSeconds` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

ALTER TABLE `course_enrollments` ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `amountPaid` int DEFAULT 0;
